Reviews.Title: “Everything you need for a stopover”

Reviews.Content: modern meticulously clean amenities 3 night stopover relatively close airport blessing arrive middle night flight location opposite deira city centre mall makes convenient theres mall breakfast eg juice bar patisserie hotel easy deira gold spice souk jumeirah beach complimentary shuttle bus jumeirah beach park worth noting drops fair burj al arab deal taxis cheap caught bus 8a unlike reviews found staff helpful accommodating provided hairdryer power adapter promptly happy giving directions particular service received stay fix booking outstanding

Reviews.Title: “Good value, good location but...”
Reviews.Author: Aix_Nice
Reviews.Content: booked hotel website couldnt believe cheap 300 dirhams clean brand bathroom reception desk useless called plug required charge mobile phone adaptor guy answered hung apart staff location hotel front carrefour deira metro station leave luggage dedicated whilst visiting city double check bill tried bill local call

Reviews.Title: “The reviews are true”
Reviews.Author: eMole
Reviews.Content: read regarding ibis deira city centre true wellpriced clean contemporary conveniently located opposite mall till midnight weekends souk cab bad expect zero service impersonal poor attitude front desk staff manager zero amenities novotels pool fee internet connection ridiculously priced paid
